lead_paragraph: Since my last, there has been a rumor here that a band of Utahs have come down on Maxwell's ranch at the Rayado, and carried off his stock. It is said that they let loose their animals over the growing crops, and offered battle to a small detachment of U. S. troops under Lieut. Whittlesey, which offer he felt too weak to accept. This rumor is discredited and with good reason.

headline.main: SANTA FE.; Indian Depredations--Dispute about a Building--Election for Delegate to Congress-The Boundary Commission, &c. From The St. Louis Republican.
